title: The 5 Things You Should Buy From Walmart’s (Yes, Walmart’s) Beauty Sale
text:
5 items in this article 5 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendors

Sephora and Ulta aren’t the only places that have major beauty sales, it turns out. This week, Walmart — of all places — introduced what they’re calling a “Fall Into Beauty Sale.” (Get it?) Until October 6, a ton of makeup and nail products are up to half the price on Walmart’s site, something I found out while trawling the internet for beauty deals, as one does. I snooped through the sale and, to my surprise, Walmart actually has a lot of really great beauty brands and products — many of which are insanely cheap right now. Below, the best of the best from the sale.

Stila Stay All Day Eyeliner $18 (was $22, now 18% off) This liquid liner from Stila is truly one is the best I’ve ever used. Not only is it super easy to apply — you don’t have to tug or pull a lot get that great precision — it also stays put all night long. My sister put me onto this liner and I’ve never looked back. $18 at Walmart Buy

Real Techniques Eye Shadow and Blender Makeup Brush Duo + Miracle Complexion Makeup Blender Sponge $7 (was $9, now 22% off) Technically speaking (no pun intended), these brushes are meant to apply eye shadow. But I personally love using them as concealer brushes — the small, feathery, soft bristles allow for really great targeted blending and spot concealing. $7 at Walmart Buy

Real Techniques Expert Face Makeup Brush + Miracle Complexion Makeup Blender Sponge $10 (was $13, now 23% off) Real Techniques is already so affordable that when their stuff goes on sale everything is basically the cost of a single La Colombe coffee. For instance, this buffing brush, which I already own and adore, and which is great for blending foundation seamlessly into the skin without any cakiness. $10 at Walmart Buy

Stila Glitter and Glow Liquid Eye Shadow, Diamond Dust $19 (was $24, now 21% off) Holiday season is just around the corner and these Stila eyeshadows are perfect for office Christmas parties. What I love most about this product is the doe-foot applicator, which lets you easily use this as an eyeshadow (one big swipe and you’re done) or as an eyeliner. A sparkly wing for the holidays? How cute! $19 at Walmart Buy

Urban Decay Naked Skin Shapeshifter Palette, Light/Medium $36 (was $45, now 20% off) This is a cream and powder double-whammy contour and highlight kit. For nights out when you want to create defined, long-lasting chisel and highlight, you can go ahead and reach for the powder. But if you want to do a subtle contour and highlight, or if your skin is a little drier today than usual, you can use the blendable cream formula. There’s also an under-eye color corrector in this, which I think is so genius! $36 at Walmart Buy

description: One writer recommends the five things to buy from Walmart’s Fall Into Beauty Sale, including Stila Stay All Day Eyeliner, Real Techniques Eye Shadow and Blender Makeup Brush Duo + Miracle Complexion Makeup Blender Sponge, and more.
